newsitem.title: JAPAN: Denmark launches yen/A$ dual-currency samurai.
newsitem.headline: Denmark launches yen/A$ dual-currency samurai.

text.p: Denmark launched 21 billion yen worth of 5.6 percent yen/Australian dollar dual-currency samurai bonds due February 3, 2000, lead-manager Daiwa Securities Co Ltd said on Wednesday.
The breakdown of the terms is as follows.
AMT 21 bln yen COUPON 5.6 pct MATURITY Feb 3, 2000
TYPE dual-currency samurai PAY DATE Oct 31, 1996
ISS PRICE par SUB PERIOD Oct 16 - Oct 30
INTEREST PAYMENT Feb 3 annually SIGN DATE Oct 15, 1996
LEAD MANAGER Daiwa Securities Co Ltd
NOTES: The bonds will be redeemed in Australian dollars, while interest will be paid in yen. The exchange rate is fixed at 5,656.11 Australian dollars for 500,000 yen.
